name: dependents
description: Get the files that depend on a given JS/SASS file

scripts.test: jshint index.js test/test.js lib bin && jscs test/test.js bin lib index.js && mocha -u bdd test/test.js test/lib/*.js
scripts.travis: npm test && unit-coverage run -p common -r lcov -o out.lcov && cat out.lcov | coveralls
